list_definition.definition: very great, especially much more than usual
very far or furthest in any direction, especially out from the centre

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: the extreme south-western tip of England

list_definition.definition: very violent or strong; not ordinary or usual

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He holds extreme views on education.

list_definition.definition: something as far, or as different, as possible from something else

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: the extremes of sadness and joy.

list_definition.definition: the greatest degree of any state, especially if unpleasant

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The extremes of heat in the desert make life uncomfortable.
